message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split is fair considering the inflation rate we are facing.
Your turn, Alice.  I need a bit more than that to agree.
Bob, time is ticking and that means money! This offer is a better deal for you than your previous one will be for me next round.
Alice, this is a good deal for both of us considering how quickly the value is dropping.
Okay, Bob, let's be practical. This offer gets us both a decent amount, considering the circumstances.  I'm willing to compromise, but this is my bottom line.
